html:
5.12.20  2:12 am   will things every change?

      yes

5.12.20  2:00 am   do you think classical harmony theory is worth studying?

      study the music. then make a theory. then compare your theory with others', over tea

5.12.20  1:51 am   How do you count to 24

      try to multiply 8 or 6 by 4 or 3 somehow, and get hopelessly lost

5.12.20  1:33 am   How are you so creative?

      we'll see

5.12.20  1:28 am   am i weird

      if so, legally i hope

5.12.20  12:52 am   This is a response to your response to my response to your response for my question (I asked how to be more productive) (And the latest response was asking for a description of my progress so far): I am in the middle of chapter 5 (@ page 32), and the characters have just arrived in the realm of where ideas come from. I seem to be slacking off recently.

      ohhhhhhhh. i assume that is because you don't actually know where ideas come from. hm, it just occured to me it looks like your 4th wall is getting shattered, at this point in the project. that's just my outside observation. i am envious, actually, at the bonkers nature of this scenario you face

5.12.20  12:38 am   what keeps you from losing your sanity

      i have discovered the recipe. now i can make my own sanity

5.12.20  12:00 am   do you like texas?

      maybe if it were bigger

5.11.20  11:02 pm   why do you abuse neon text

      what the hell is neon text

5.11.20  10:48 pm   I seem to have the opposite problem of yours that I find it difficult to think of instrumental breaks but have little to no problem thinking of lyrics. What can I do?

      what about music for the lyrics

5.11.20  10:32 pm   who are some of your biggest influences when it comes to composing?

      oops, everyone influenced me and now i can't tell which is which

5.11.20  10:25 pm   As someone who creates and works with music constantly, I've found that over the years I've been losing the ability to just enjoy music without thinking about it too much. It's hard for me nowadays to just listen to a song as a song. I always start analyzing the mix and chords and whatnot and it's very hard for me to pay attention to lyrics if there's some cool product trick I recognize. Do you find this happening to you at all?

      it probably happens in the field of whatever stage of learning you are going through. for example, if you are learning how to paint apples, you're going to see a lot of apple painting everywhere. one day when you have more thoroughly assimilated apple painting into your life, you will not be so fixated on that but something else instead which you are currently learning

5.11.20  9:39 pm   why do you like trees so much?

      i just get the feeling they were meant to be here

5.11.20  9:33 pm   what do I do when I have so much energy and so many ideas that im about to start rapidly vibrating and explode.

      stay calm and get good with writing on a blank page, or talking. Your first line of rescue against 'too many idea syndrome' is a fast and simple communication medium in your native tongue. your next line of rescue is careful curation of any such generated writings. your next line of rescue is project manager, but that will come into play once you have a steady hand on the receiver

5.11.20  9:30 pm   What's your view on fans being worried about the period of time between projects?

      they are attempting to be worried as much as me, but they are not even close

5.11.20  9:17 pm   can you take me to the land of ten-letter words

      absolutely......... definitely

5.11.20  8:57 pm   why dont you type in capitals

      i do but why don't you

5.11.20  8:49 pm   Why is there an increasing amount of questions involving pineapple and pizza??

      are you kidding, that one's been around since the stone ages

5.11.20  8:26 pm   Why do you like the one direction song " steal your girl"? I just dont get it...

      you must have not listened to it. wait no, it's called everybody wanna 'steal My girl", not your. maybe you have a different song

5.11.20  8:25 pm   What software for 3D animation are you using?

      bpy

5.11.20  8:12 pm   What's your personal favorite video/music you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

5.11.20  7:16 pm   if i go from the I chord to the IV chord and then back and forth, in a major key, it's like there's a fight between two different worlds

      a deep spiritual debate

5.11.20  6:52 pm   when make song

      right away, i promise. my name is joe promise

5.11.20  6:44 pm   it used to be easy to make original (bad) music simply because even if I tried I couldn't come close to whatever I tried to copy, wether it be a feeling, a drum pattern or a "genre". Now I've gotten a really tiny bit better at translating my thoughts into music, but with that I've started noticing that most of my ideas are very slight variation of things I've heard in other songs, and the problem is it's often similar melodies or overall feeling and I feel like a thief... I guess imitation is the first (in my case second) step to learning to make good original music. What do you think? Am I on the right path?

      wait til you hear about how big of a thief everyone else is

5.11.20  6:03 pm   Thanks for being dedicated. Your music shines

      thank you for your sudden outburst of friendlyness, and friendly behaviour

5.11.20  5:37 pm   Is one lasagna stacked on top of another lasagna two lasagnas or one big lasagna?

      that's a house.

5.11.20  5:30 pm   What is the funniest joke you've heard?

      when something other than a joke is funny

5.11.20  4:59 pm   There were some predictions around 20 - 30 May that came in, and you are aiming at a two week production time. Are you powerful enough yet?

      yes but i'm still going to get more powerful

5.11.20  4:49 pm   How would you, personally, define the word "normal"?

      sPeCtAcULaR

5.11.20  4:39 pm   what your opinion on different types of music and why there's so much of it?

      this is a side effect of how big the space time continuum is

5.11.20  4:37 pm   Does pineapple belong on pizza?

      put it this way.... it looks great in pictures with pizza

5.11.20  4:30 pm   Do you enjoy tea?

     no (duck)

      If so, what's your favorite variety?

      there are so many great varieties to choose from

5.11.20  4:29 pm   do you ever hit a point in the production process where you have so many sounds going on and you don't know whether there's too many sounds or not enough?

     no. usually i know there's too many, but if i take some away, THEN it seems like there's too few

      if so, what do you do? and if you've never experienced this, do you have any advice? i'm just trying to make short stuff but go all out with production and I keep getting to this point

     ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

5.11.20  4:03 pm   Are you a computer?

      no, but sometimes i remind myself of one

5.11.20  4:02 pm   are deadlines necessary for your survival

      probably/possibly

5.11.20  3:51 pm   10 + 10 = ?

      what do you think i am, some kind of supercomputer

5.11.20  3:46 pm   what is pi divided by pi?

      1

5.11.20  2:42 pm   where does perfectionism live?

      nowhere

5.11.20  2:41 pm   At the end of this project, do you think you will be able to make videos faster? Or just crazier and better?

      that's the whole point. also the project doesn't stop there. wait, what project

5.11.20  2:36 pm   Opinion on phones?

      they are single handedly destroying the mail industry

5.11.20  1:47 pm   is idaho real?

      Yes. in fact, realness is their trade mark

5.11.20  1:46 pm   How do i ask a question?

      impossible. it can't be done

5.11.20  1:42 pm   is the world the worst place

      no

5.11.20  1:42 pm   Could I interest you in a plate of fettuccine alfredo?

      no. i'm not falling for that one again

5.11.20  1:32 pm   Opinion on the creation of the world

      someone's gotta do it

5.11.20  1:23 pm   Why do we as humans exist? Out of all odds and possibilities, why us? Why this?

      don't you get it, everything exists, but you only get an up close look at the one you currently are. For example, somewhere/when, a kpjcbc6fidx3wa7 is asking why a kpjcbc6fidx3wa7 exists. and so forth

5.11.20  1:16 pm   What's your favorite car?

      regular

5.11.20  1:10 pm   Can you say something 

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

5.11.20  1:09 pm   What is the purpose of your music?

      make the most of life and the living experience

5.11.20  1:05 pm   What lies at the end of the rainbow?

      you
